title: Les Trois Mousquetaires = the Three Musketeers (TV version)
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Alexandre Dumas.
description: In this live to air recording of the classic story  by Alexandre Dumas, D'Artagnan, a young provincial noble, travels to Paris to join the musketeers. He meets action, love, hate, the king and the queen as his impetuousness gets him involved in political plots... and of course virile and indestructible friendship with the three musketeers Athos, Porthos and Aramis. A young Belmondo plays the dashing hero.  Credits: Director, Claude Barma ; writers, Claude Barma, Pierre Nivollet ; photography, Jacques Lemare ; music, Jean Marion. Cast: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Jean Chevrier, Daniel Sorano, Hubert Noel, Gaby Sylvia, Pierre Asso, Michel Galabru, Georges Descrieres, Bernard Dheran, Robert Hirsch, Michel Galabru.
